thread.title: NicKk Spano
thread.title_full: Restaurant Equipment Club reviewed by NicKk Spano

author: NicKk Spano
title: NicKk Spano
text: Anthony Donate and REC was a great resource for the Atosa Hot Plate I received last week. The frieght company was great, communication and delivery time was spot on. There was a small dent on table, on backside, so it is unnoticeable. Other than that, both items in perfect condition. After using it this week, very happy with unit. It works great and looks great. I plan to purchase again from Restaurant Equipment Club.
